com.google.code.rees.scope
Interface ScopeManager

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultScopeManager
public interface ScopeManager
extends Serializable

Uses a ConversationManager and SessionManager to provide external frameworks with central manager for processing both the conversation and session scopes.

Author:
rees.byars

Method Summary
 void processScopes()
          Performs the scope processing for the conversation and session scopes
 void setConversationManager(ConversationManager manager)
          Sets the ConversationManager that this manager will use
 void setScopeAdapterFactory(ScopeAdapterFactory adapterFactory)
          Sets the ScopeAdapterFactory that this manager will use for generating scope adapters.
 void setSessionManager(SessionManager manager)
          Sets the SessionManager that this manager will use
